markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Wolf Skeleton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1899)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Without the burden of flesh, skeletal wolves charge across the battlefield with terrifying speed.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Skeleton_Wolf.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Wolf Skeleton](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1899)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 147

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +3 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 12
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

</row>

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 5, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 5, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +8,
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing plus [Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=20)

**Surge of Speed** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The wolf skeleton Strides three times, but it's [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of its next turn.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-92" />
name: Wolf Skeleton

Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 14 Unspecific Lore : DC 12 Specific Lore : DC 9 Wolf Skeleton Source Book of the Dead pg. 147 Perception +8; darkvision Languages Skills Acrobatics +6, Athletics +4, Stealth +6 Str +2 Dex +4 Con +1 Int -5 Wis +2 Cha +0 --- AC 16 Fort +3 Ref +8 Will +6 HP 12 (negative healing) Immunities death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Resistances cold 5, electricity 5, fire 5, piercing 5, slashing 5 --- Speed 35 feet Melee Single Action jaws +8, Damage 1d4+2 piercing plus Knockdown Surge of Speed Two Actions The wolf skeleton Strides three times, but it's flat-footed until the start of its next turn.
